1.0.name: wordpress/tejus-add-cat-image
1.0.description: Using this plugin you can associate one image with each of your category created in wordpress. and you can call that image by using provided function in any template file tejus_dj_getcatimg($catid) call this function in any template file it will return url of that image. where $catid is category id of that category. my facebook profile : https://www.facebook.com/dhananjay.singh2 my company website: http://tejuscreative.com/

2.0.name: wordpress/tejus-add-cat-image
